data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Santa Balvina cruise from Cádiz to Callao de Lima started at 1780-12-15
Ship: Santa Balvina (Paquebote), Voyage: Cádiz - Callao De Lima, 1st Observer: Román de Novia (Capitan)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
